hyperparameters.name: C
hyperparameters.short_desc: Inverse of regularization strength; must be a positive float. Like in support vector machines, smaller values specify stronger regularization.

hyperparameters.name: kernel
hyperparameters.short_desc: Specifies the kernel type to be used in the algorithm

hyperparameters.name: degree
hyperparameters.short_desc: Degree of the polynomial kernel function (poly). This argument is ignored for all other kernel functions
